channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AZ
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AZ

item.title: Report E-2024050299
item.description:
Report E-2024050299

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-16T15:11:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-11
  • City: HOLBROOK
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 17000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO Logistics contacted ERTS regarding a product leak at an XPO drop lot. A Contractor determined that the release stemmed from a pinhole size puncture as a result of improper loading on a 55-gallon metal drum. The exterior of the drum appeared damaged by friction with another drum causing the puncture. The drum contained the product, ‘Lemon Sage Fragrance’. The release was approximately 1-gallon and impacted the wooden trailer floor in an 8’x6’ area. The Contractor cleaned-up the release with absorbent rags and overpacked the damaged drum. One drum of waste was generated from this incident. No storm-drains, waterways, or soil were impacted by this incident.
